meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: The matelasses had a beautiful design that felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bedspread made of matelasses to add texture to her room.
meanings.sent3: The matelasses looked like tiny hills on the fabric, making it unique.
meanings.sent4: The matelasses on the fabric resembled little waves, creating a tactile experience.
meanings.sent5: The intricate matelasses on the cloth made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: To create a raised pattern on fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully matelasses the fabric to give it a textured look.
meanings.sent2: The artisan matelasses the material to add depth to the design.
meanings.sent3: He matelasses the cloth with precision, turning it into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Matelassing the fabric is a skill that requires attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The way she matelasses the fabric transforms it into something extraordinary.
